short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to search for multiple keywords on job listings in Hacker News' Who's Hiring thread.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search for jobs using multiple  keywords on the Hacker News Who is Hiring thread.
